Uses of Package
BBjGridExWidget.Columns

  • Packages that use BBjGridExWidget.Columns 
    Package Description
    BBjGridExWidget.Columns  
  • Classes in BBjGridExWidget.Columns used by BBjGridExWidget.Columns 
    Class and Description
    BBjGridExWidgetColumn
    The class holds the grid column props , it aslo introduces serveral helper methods to update the styles like , fore/back colors.
    BBjGridExWidgetColumnDefinition
    The class holds the common props between column and column groups
    BBjGridExWidgetColumnGroup
    The class holds the grid column group.
    BBjGridExWidgetColumnsManagerInterface
    The inteface defines the common methods for columns and column groups managment
    BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnDefinition
    The class reprensets the default column defintion which the grid will use.
    BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnGroup
    The class holds the default grid column group.
